profile.name: Pemika Chongkwanyuen
profile.title: Computer Engineering Student
profile.about: I am a Computer Engineering student at KMUTT (Honors Program) with a strong passion for Data Science, AI, and Software Development. I have experience in full-stack development, chatbot creation, and hardware integration. I am an active learner seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world projects.

education.institution: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)

experience.description: Organized the 11th Applied Mathematics Workshop for Honors students in Kanchanaburi. Led interdisciplinary group activities to foster unity and relationships between juniors and seniors, while promoting the application of mathematical skills outside the classroom.

experience.company: The Artificial Intelligence Association of Thailand (AIAT)
experience.description: Advance to Level 2 and be eligible to receive a 50,000 THB scholarship.

projects.title: Hotel Service Line & Facebook Chatbot
projects.description: AI chatbot for 'The Rich Hotel Rama V' to automate customer service, handling inquiries about room rates and facilities 24/7.

projects.title: FPGA - Tetris
projects.description: This project implements the classic puzzle game Tetris on an FPGA board using Verilog. The game runs on a Digilent Basys3 (Xilinx Artix-7) and outputs graphics via VGA, with scores displayed on a 7-segment display.

projects.title: Domacod | 1st Runner-up NSC 2022
projects.description: An application to index images based on the content of the image. By using object detection and optical character recognition, we categorized images and enabled text searching.

projects.title: Smart Elderly Care Service | National Finalist in ASEAN DSE 2022
projects.description: Developed a data analytics storyboard and designed a 'Caregiver Hub' solution based on data analysis of the aging society in ASEAN.

projects.title: C Man - Shortest Path Algo Comparison
projects.description: A Pac-Man inspired game implemented in C to demonstrate real-time pathfinding. Features intelligent 'ghosts' powered by A*, Dijkstra, BFS, and IDDFS algorithms, allowing for a comparative observation of algorithmic performance in a dynamic environment.

projects.title: PSU Chatbot | 2nd Runner-up BOTNOI Chatbot Marahackathon 2022
projects.description: Developed a chatbot for Prince of Songkla University's Law Faculty to handle student requests and FAQs.

projects.title: N'Highlight School Chatbot
projects.description: N'Highlight is a Line chatbot that assists students and faculty members in school. This chatbot is used to compete in BOTNOI Marahackathon 2022 preliminary round.

projects.title: Simple Blockchain Simulator
projects.description: A lightweight Blockchain Simulator built in C to demonstrate the core mechanisms of blockchain such as block creation, transaction recording, hashing with SHA-256, and handling tamper attempts.

projects.title: Student Event Planner
projects.description: A web application built to help students, lecturers, organizers, and admins manage and join university events. Key capabilities include authentication, event management, registration, QR check-in, notifications, and role-based access.

projects.title: Custom Linux Kernel & Process Monitor
projects.description: A Compilation of a custom Linux 6.14 HWE kernel and the development of a Loadable Kernel Module (LKM). The module exposes internal `task_struct` data via a custom `/proc` entry to a user-space C tool for real-time process and thread monitoring.
